sentence.Network_en: The action is an open violation of the Vienna Convention.
sentence.Network_cn: 该行为公然违背了《维也纳公约》。

sentence.Network_en: Without warning, Bardo smacked his fist into his open hand.
sentence.Network_cn: 巴多没有任何预兆地一拳砸在自己摊开的手掌上.

sentence.Network_en: It's an open secret that the security service bugged telephones.
sentence.Network_cn: 安全部门窃听电话是人人皆知的秘密。
